## Load Xeva
Load Xeva library and data.
```{r load, echo=TRUE}
library(Xeva)
cdf = readRDS("~/CXP/Xeva/DATA-raw/celineData.Rds")
head(ModelInfo(cdf))
```

Models which belongs to same batch are in one list which is stored in expDesign slot. For example
```{r, echo=TRUE}
print(cdf@expDesign[[1]]) 
```

To calculate angle between the treatment and control samples of this batch
```{r, echo=TRUE}
batch = cdf@expDesign[[1]]
ang = calculateAngle(cdf, batch, plot=TRUE)
print(ang)
```
